meaning_str.bing:
n. 护理；照顾；小心；照料
v. 关心；关怀；在意；关注
abbr. (=Cooperative for American Relief Everywhere)美国援外合作组织
网络. 在乎；注意

(=Cooperative for American Relief Everywhere)美国援外合作组织

关心；关怀；照料；照顾；保养；护理；照看；看护；用心；细心；小心；谨慎；注意；慎重考虑；忧虑；焦虑；担忧；挂念；顾虑；引起烦恼的事；令人焦虑的事
关心；关怀；关注；在乎；重视；在意；介意；照顾；照料；护理；看护
（CARE）美国援外合作署（Cooperative for American Relief Everywhere的缩写）；起因和排除故障（Cause And Removal Error的缩写）；关闭与重组执行（Closure and Realignment Execution的缩写）

1.en: I didn't know if there was something brewing, and if it was, I didn't know how much I'd care. . .
1.cn: 我不知是否有一些东西正慢慢在发酵，亦不知倘若如此，我又会有几分在意…

2.en: The fact that the medical-industrial complex is trying to shape health care reform rather than block it is a tremendously good omen.
2.cn: 现在的事实是，医疗-产业联合体正在支持而不是破坏医改，这是个非常好的兆头。

3.en: We have prepared this Birth Plan to help you understand our philosophy and the kind of care we hope to have for the birth of our child.
3.cn: 我们准备了这份生产计划书，希望能够帮助你们理解我们生孩子的理念以及我们在孩子出生这个问题上所希望得到的照料方式。

2.en: You know you can't take care of him.
2.cn: 你知道你照顾不了他的。

3.en: You will care for it, you will teach it.

4.en: But I'm supposed to take care of you guys.

5.en: Well then, I'm satisfied with my care.
5.cn: 那好吧，我很满意你的照顾。

6.en: Peppa, you really must take more care of Teddy. Teddy.
6.cn: 佩奇，你也应该好好照顾你的泰迪！泰迪。

7.en: Darling, Daddy's taking care of his two favorite girls.
7.cn: 亲爱的，爸爸正在照顾着他最爱的两个姑娘。

8.en: I also took care of my little sister. I pretty much took care of her from the time she was born until she was in high school.
8.cn: 我还照顾过我的妹妹，基本上都是我在照顾她，从她出生到上高中。

9.en: Okay, so what do I need to know to take care of her?

10.en: And there was no one there to take care of you?
10.cn: 当时没有人在那里照顾你么？

11.en: Okay, so, have fun and take very good care of them, okay?
11.cn: 好了，玩得开心，照顾好他们，好吗？

12.en: And his girlfriend Jeanne Hebuterne was there taking care of him.
12.cn: 他的女朋友珍妮·赫布特尼在那里照顾着他。

13.en: I am your father, okay? And I have been busting my ass to take care of you.
13.cn: 我是你父亲，我尽心尽力的在照顾你。

14.en: I can not deactivate until you say: You are satisfied with your care.
14.cn: 直到你说你满意我的照顾，我才可以结束工作。

15.en: I can not deactivate until you say: You are satisfied with your care.
15.cn: 直到你说：我很满意你的照顾，我才会结束工作。

16.en: I'm almost 16, godmother. I can take care of myself. I understand.
16.cn: 我已经16岁了，教母，我可以自己照顾自己。我知道。

17.en: Yeah, you guys go. We'll take care of her. You have nothing to worry about.
17.cn: 你们走吧。我们会照顾她的。你们什么都别担心。

18.en: Oh, I don't know. Remember what happened when I took care of your goldfish?
18.cn: 我不知道，还记得以前我是怎么照顾你的金鱼的吗？

19.en: Mom did. Mom always took care of everything. Mom was a mess, Missy was a dumb teenager. I had to look after both of 'em.
19.cn: 妈妈啊。妈总是照顾好了一切。妈妈当时魂不守舍，米希是个中二少女。只能我来一肩挑起照顾她们的责任。
